project.name: IonicVueApp1-LoginExample
project.notes: This project features a FizzBuzz script and a recursive factorial block that you can run and debug inside Snap! and also compile into various text-based programming languages: * JavaScript * Smalltalk * Python * C Enjoy! -Jens

scene.name: IonicVueApp1-LoginExample

code.doFirebaseImportFireStore: import {getFirestore,collection,doc,setDoc,addDoc,getDocs,getDoc,query,where,updateDoc,deleteDoc} from "https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.3.0/firebase-firestore.js"; window.<#1> = getFirestore(); window.collection = collection window.doc = doc window.setDoc = setDoc window.addDoc = addDoc window.getDocs = getDocs window.getDoc = getDoc window.query = query window.where = where window.updateDoc = updateDoc window.deleteDoc = deleteDoc
code.doFirebaseImportFireAuth: import {getAuth ,sendEmailVerification, signOut , onAuthStateChanged , signInWithEmailAndPassword , createUserWithEmailAndPassword ,RecaptchaVerifier,signInWithPhoneNumber } from "https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.3.0/firebase-auth.js"; window.<#1> = getAuth(); window.sendEmailVerification = sendEmailVerification window.signOut = signOut window.onAuthStateChanged = onAuthStateChanged window.signInWithEmailAndPassword = signInWithEmailAndPassword window.createUserWithEmailAndPassword = createUserWithEmailAndPassword window.RecaptchaVerifier = RecaptchaVerifier window.signInWithPhoneNumber = signInWithPhoneNumber

code.doVueFileOptions: const <#1> = { moduleCache: { vue: Vue }, async getFile(url) { var xmlHttp = new XMLHttpRequest(); xmlHttp.open( "GET", url, false ); // false for synchronous request xmlHttp.send( null ); return xmlHttp.responseText; }, addStyle(textContent) { const style = Object.assign(document.createElement('style'), { textContent }); const ref = document.head.getElementsByTagName('style')[0] || null; document.head.insertBefore(style, ref); }, log(type, ...args) { console[type](...args); }, compiledCache: { set(key, str) { for (; ;) { try { // doc: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Storage window.localStorage.setItem(key, str); break; } catch (ex) { // handle: Uncaught DOMException: Failed to execute 'setItem' on 'Storage': Setting the value of 'XXX' exceeded the quota window.localStorage.removeItem(window.localStorage.key(0)); } } }, get(key) { return window.localStorage.getItem(key); }, } } const {<#2>} = window['vue3-sfc-loader'] ;

list.l: async function handleButtonClick(ev) { popover = await popoverController.create({ component: "popover-example-page", event: ev, translucent: true }); currentPopover = popover; return popover.present(); }
function dismissPopover() { if (currentPopover) { currentPopover.dismiss().then(() => { currentPopover = null; }); } }

customElements.define("popover-example-page", class ModalContent extends HTMLElement { connectedCallback() { this.innerHTML = ` <ion-list> <ion-list-header>Ionic</ion-list-header> <ion-item button>Learn Ionic</ion-item> <ion-item button>Documentation</ion-item> <ion-item button>Showcase</ion-item> <ion-item button>GitHub Repo</ion-item> <ion-item lines="none" detail="false" button onClick="dismissPopover()">Close</ion-item> </ion-list> `; } });

block-definition.s: Login UI: user= %'userID' password= %'passwoedId' loginFn: %'loginEvent' registerFn: %'registerEvent' resetFn: %'forgotEvent'
block-definition.code: <ion-list > <ion-item > <ion-label position ="floating">帳號</ion-label> <ion-input placeholder ="請輸入帳號" :value=<#1> @input="<#1>=$event.target.value"></ion-input> </ion-item> <ion-item > <ion-label position ="floating">密碼</ion-label> <ion-input placeholder ="請輸入密碼" :value=<#2> @input="<#2>=$event.target.value" type ="password"></ion-input> </ion-item> <ion-button expand ="block" color ="medium" @click="<#3>">登入</ion-button> <ion-item lines ="none"> <ion-button fill ="clear" @click="<#5>">忘記密碼</ion-button> <ion-button fill ="clear" slot ="end" @click="<#4>">註冊</ion-button> </ion-item> </ion-list>

/* var _snapuser = localStorage.getItem('-snaplogin-user'); var _snapcode = localStorage.getItem('-snaplogin-code'); if(_snapuser!=null){ <#1>.value = _snapuser <#2>.value = _snapcode console.log(_snapuser); console.log(_snapcode); } */ function <#1> () { snap.verifyUser(<#2>.value,<#3>.value) .then( (response)=>{ if (response) { console.log(response) if ((response == "no authenticate")) { <#5> } else { localStorage.setItem('-snaplogin-user',<#2>.value); localStorage.setItem('-snaplogin-code',response); <#4> } } else { <#5> } } ) .catch( (e)=>{ console.log(e) <#5> } ); }

block-definition.code:
進行帳號註冊 {{<#7>}}

帳號 @input="<#1>=$event.target.value"> E-mail @input="<#2>=$event.target.value"> 密碼 @input="<#3>=$event.target.value"> 確認密碼 @input="<#4>=$event.target.value"> <#5> 註冊

block.l: 請輸入註冊的帳號名稱
請再輸入一次密碼進行確認

block-definition.s: Register fn: %'register' user= %'user' mail= %'mail' password= %'password' confirmpassword= %'confirmpassword' %'success' onErrorMessage= %'errorMessage' %'failure'
block-definition.code: function <#1> () { if ((!<#3>.value.match(/([a-zA-Z0-9._-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9._-]+\.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)/))) { <#7>.value = "信件格式錯誤" ; <#8> return ; } if ((!(<#4>.value.length > 7))) { <#7>.value = "密碼長度至少是8" ; <#8> return ; } if ((!(<#4>.value == <#5>.value))) { <#7>.value = "兩次的密碼不正確請做確認" ; <#8> return ; } snap.isExist(<#2>.value) .then( (response)=>{ if ((!response)) { console.log("可註冊"); snap.registerUser(<#2>.value,<#4>.value,<#3>.value) .then( (response)=>{ <#7>.value = "" ; <#6> } ) .catch( (error)=>{ <#7>.value = error ; <#8> } ) } else { <#7>.value = "該帳號名已存在，請換其他名稱" ; <#8> } } ) .catch( (e)=>{ console.log(e); <#7>.value = e ; <#8> } ); }

block-definition.code:
重新設置密碼

請輸入帳號名稱與E-mail @input="<#1>=$event.target.value"> @input="<#2>=$event.target.value"> 重設密碼

function <#1> () { if ((!<#3>.value.match(/([a-zA-Z0-9._-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9._-]+\.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)/))) { <#5>.value = "信件格式錯誤"; <#6> return ; } snap.verifyUserAndEmail(<#2>.value,<#3>.value) .then( async(response)=>{ if (response) { <#4> } else { <#5>.value = "帳號與信箱不符合，無法修改"; <#6> } } ) .catch( (e)=>{ console.log(e); <#5>.value = e; <#6> } ); }

block-definition.code: <ion-item > <ion-label position ="floating">密碼 </ion-label> <ion-input type ="password" placeholder ="請輸入新密碼" :value=<#1> @input="<#1>=$event.target.value"></ion-input> </ion-item> <ion-item > <ion-label position ="floating">確認密碼 </ion-label> <ion-input type ="password" placeholder ="請再輸入一次密碼進行確認" :value=<#2> @input="<#2>=$event.target.value"></ion-input> </ion-item> <ion-button expand ="block" color ="medium" @click="<#3>">更換密碼</ion-button>

block.l: 請再輸入一次密碼進行確認

block-definition.s: NewPassword fn: %'function' user= %'user' password= %'password' cofirm= %'cofirm' %'success' onErrorMessage= %'errorMessage' %'failure'
block-definition.code: function <#1> () { if ((!(<#3>.value.length > 7))) { <#6>.value = "密碼長度至少是8" ; <#7> return ; } if ((!(<#3>.value == <#4>.value))) { <#6>.value = "兩次的密碼不正確請做確認" ; <#7> return ; } snap.modifyPassword(<#2>.value,<#3>.value) .then( async(response)=>{ if (response) { <#5> } else { <#6>.value = "更新失敗請聯絡客服" ; <#7> } } ) .catch( (e)=>{ console.log(e); <#6>.value = e ; <#7> } ); }

scripts.comment: 1. use "Run in Cloud" 2. write your main html/vue in App.vue 3. In App.vue load other .vue files 4. if there is db.json data. A. download the db.json B. run "json-server db.json" C. run your project with "Run in Cloud"
